channel.title: Blade of Opportune, and several other HD model scenes
channel.description:
Yeah, just messing around with materials and lighting, nice clean model in the end, looks pretty. :o
[url=http://uppit.com/v/L96F0S2S]http://uppit.com/v/L96F0S2S[/url]
Metasequoia render, yes it's capable of fitting in a client. [url=http://i285.photobucket.com/albums/ll63/Silent_CJ/Sword.png]http://i285.photobucket.com/albums/ll63/Silent_CJ/Sword.png[/url]
And other renders. :D
[img]http://i285.photobucket.com/albums/ll63/Silent_CJ/Sword2.png[/img]
[img]http://i285.photobucket.com/albums/ll63/Silent_CJ/Sword3.png[/img]
[img]http://i285.photobucket.com/albums/ll63/Silent_CJ/Sword4.png[/img]
And... an alternate version. [img]http://i285.photobucket.com/albums/ll63/Silent_CJ/Sword2-1.png[/img]
[img]http://i285.photobucket.com/albums/ll63/Silent_CJ/Sword6-1.png[/img]
Wireframe: [img]http://i285.photobucket.com/albums/ll63/Silent_CJ/SwordWireframe.jpg[/img]
Post your opinions.

item.title: Blade of Opportune, and several other HD model scenes

wow ^^
i like that
verry cool

woah, epic deja vu

item.source: Blade of Opportune, and several other HD model scenes

item.title: Blade of Opportune, and several other HD model scenes
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

[quote=“shrogg, post:39, topic:327013”]yeah well, you are usin 3ds, and that’s freeken hard to do anything on, so far ive got a vague blob and a stick out of it
but i think im gettin someware…[/quote]

Yeahh, tis a little hard to pick up, I started by building tables, eventually built up to doing all the furniture in the front room of my house, in quite some detail, the draw slides out, the doors have pivots and shelves inside etc.

Read full topic

item.source: Blade of Opportune, and several other HD model scenes

item.title: Blade of Opportune, and several other HD model scenes
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

dylan_0789:

I like the simplicity of the model. The hilt is ugly though, aswell as the gold groove. the groove should match the blade color… the hilt should have the gold if anything does, although a Brass color would do the hilt more justice.

Thanks.
I find the hilt was quite pretty, ah well, aha, my material choices are just shit I guess.

And I do have an image of when the groove was the same material as the blade, but it was quite bland, so I wanted to spice it up a little bit.

[quote=“shrogg, post:37, topic:327013”]i like the sword
you could do better, but then again, it need’s to fit into a client…
but yeah, im gonna get started on 3ds soon (i want to get a job at wetta digital (the guy’s who did avatar and lord of the ring’s)[/quote]

Mehhh, I dunnoooo, this is probably the best sword I’ve done with 3ds max so far, don’t know why everyone’s saying I can do better, aha.

But I’ll try make the next piece of weaponry a little more complex, that is, when or if I ever get round to doing another model.

Read full topic
